lineage.Process: ExtractByMask UVVR_Whole Sapowet_Tidesheds "E:\Coastal Habitat Restoration Team\UVVR Training\UVVR Training\Rasters\uvvr_clip" Inside "124314.6402 54547.2152999993 125669.6595 56469.9692000002 PROJCS["NAD_1983_2011_StatePlane_Rhode_Island_FIPS_3800",GEOGCS["GCS_NAD_1983_2011",DATUM["D_NAD_1983_2011",SPHEROID["GRS_1980",6378137.0,298.257222101]],PRIMEM["Greenwich",0.0],UNIT["Degree",0.0174532925199433]],PROJECTION["Transverse_Mercator"],PARAMETER["False_Easting",100000.0],PARAMETER["False_Northing",0.0],PARAMETER["Central_Meridian",-71.5],PARAMETER["Scale_Factor",0.99999375],PARAMETER["Latitude_Of_Origin",41.08333333333334],UNIT["Meter",1.0]]"

dataIdInfo.idPurp:
The classification of the salt marsh surface clipped within the boundaries of the Sapowet Marsh tidal watersheds polygon (Tiverton, RI). Classification was completed with the ArcGIS Pro Classification Wizard based on the NDVI imagery. Classification Wizard was trained on the Sapowet Training Polygons. Classification raster was altered post-classification to address errors of floating algae, tree shadows, and temporary wrack.
The raster was created as part of a tutorial for imagery classification and calculation of the unvegetated - vegetated ratio (UVVR) for salt marsh systems.
